TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MSBuild extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.TaskExtension

Attribute.AttributeName: Microsoft.Build.Framework.RunInMTA

summary.span: 实现 MSBuild 任务。

span.span: Implements the MSBuild task.

summary.span: 使用项目文件中的 MSBuild 元素创建和执行此任务。

span.span: Use the MSBuild element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅 [MSBuild 任务](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76577f6c-7669-44ad-a840-363e37a04d34)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [MSBuild Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76577f6c-7669-44ad-a840-363e37a04d34).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现了 "MSBuild" 任务，该任务将子项目文件移交给要生成的 MSBuild 引擎。This class implements the "MSBuild" task, which hands off child project files to the MSBuild engine to be built. 标记为 RunInMTA，因为 MSBuild 任务不应在生成它们的 RequestBuilder 的线程上运行。Marked RunInMTA because there is no reason MSBuild tasks should run on a thread other than that of the RequestBuilder which spawned them.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定是否尽可能并行生成在 属性中指定的项目。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the projects specified in the property are built in parallel, if possible.

value.span: 如果尽可能并行生成在 属性中指定的项目，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the projects specified in the property are built in parallel if possible; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`.

span.span: A semicolon-delimited list of property name/value pairs to apply as global properties to the child project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你指定此参数时，它在功能上等效于在使用生成时设置具有 **/property**开关的属性。When you specify this parameter, it is functionally equivalent to setting properties that have the **/property** switch when you build with .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 任务是否一次一个地调用列表中被传递到 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 的每个目标，而不是同时调用。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task invokes each target in the list passed to [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] one at a time, instead of at the same time.

value.span: 如果 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 任务一次一个地调用列表中被传递到 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 的每个目标，则此值为 ；如果 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 任务在同一时间调用列表中的所有目标，则为 。

span.span: if the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task invokes each target in the list passed to [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] one at a time; if the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task invokes all targets in the list at the same time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为 `true` 可保证即使之前调用的目标失败，也会调用后续目标。Setting this property to `true` guarantees that subsequent targets are invoked even if previously invoked targets failed. 否则，生成错误将停止调用所有后续目标。Otherwise, a build error would stop invocation of all subsequent targets. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定是否将跳过磁盘上不存在的项目文件。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether project files that do not exist on the disk will be skipped.

value.span: 如果将跳过磁盘上不存在的项目文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if project files that do not exist on the disk will be skipped; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不跳过磁盘上不存在的项目文件，它们将导致生成错误。If project files that do not exist on the disk are not skipped, they will cause a build error.

Attribute.AttributeName: Microsoft.Build.Framework.Output

summary.span: 返回出自所有项目文件的生成目标的输出。

span.span: Returns the outputs of the built targets from all the project files.

summary.span: 仅返回出自所指定目标的输出，不返回存在于目标所依赖的目标上的任何输出。

span.span: Only the outputs from the targets that were specified are returned, not any outputs that may exist on targets that those targets depend on.

value.span: 出自所有项目文件的生成目标的输出。

span.span: The outputs of the built targets from all the project files.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在该项目文件中生成的一个目标或多个目标。

span.span: Gets or sets the target or targets to build in the project files.

summary.span: 使用分号分隔一系列目标名称。

span.span: Use a semicolon to separate a list of target names.

value.span: 要在项目文件中生成的一个或多个目标。

span.span: The target or targets to build in the project files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未在 `MSBuild` 任务中指定任何目标，则会生成在项目文件中指定的默认目标。If no targets are specified in the `MSBuild` task, the default targets specified in the project files are built.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个要用于生成该项目的目标 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 版本，这样，[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 任务可以生成一个针对非该项目中指定的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 版本的项目。

span.span: Gets or sets a target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version to build the project with, which enables an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task to build a project that targets a different version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] than the one specified in the project.

summary.span: 有效值为 、 和 。

span.span: Valid values are , and .

value.span: 要用于生成该项目的目标 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 版本。

span.span: The target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version to build the project with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `3.5.`The default value is `3.5.`

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示 MSBuild 引擎是否返回缓存中的已生成目标。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the MSBuild engine will return the built targets from the cache.

span.span: if the MSBuild engine will return the built targets from the cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 现金中生成的目标的作用域为（ProjectFileName，GlobalProperties） [TargetNames] 作为生成项的列表。The scope of built targets in the cash is (ProjectFileName, GlobalProperties)[TargetNames] as a list of build items. 版本4.0 中不再使用此属性。This property is no longer used in version 4.0.
